placeholder.description.en_US: When it comes to content, a lot of webmasters find it difficult to add text content to an ecommerce category page because it can break up the design of the page and draw the attention away from the most important elements of the page i.e. the products. With Spryker you can easily select the desired position for your CMS block.

placeholder.description.en_US: If you're considering a new laptop, looking for a powerful new car stereo or shopping for a new HDTV, we make it easy to find exactly what you need at a price you can afford. We offer Every Day Low Prices on TVs, laptops, smartphones, tablets and iPads, desktop computers, cameras and camcorders, audio, video and more.

placeholder.description.de_DE: Somero ist mehr als nur ein Demo Shop - er hat eine Mission zu erfüllen! Das Ziel ist es, die Großartigkeit der Modularität des Spryker Commerce OS darzustellen. Erfreu dich am ausgeklügelten Design, teste die Reaktionsfreudigkeit und genieße die Schnelligkeit! Spring vor Freude an die Decke, wenn du die beste E-Commerce Lösung der Welt testest.
placeholder.description.en_US: Somero is not just a demo shop, it’s mission is to showcase the brilliance and modularity of the Spryker Commerce OS. Check out the sleek design, test the responsiveness. Enjoy the speed! You too could be dancing all the way to the bank with the best e-commerce solution the world has ever seen.

placeholder.title.de_DE: “Als wir Spryker entworfen haben, war es unser Ziel, ein System zu realisieren, das sowohl für kleine Taskforce-ähnliche Teams gut funktioniert als auch für große IT Teams mit ehrgeizigen Backlogs.“
placeholder.title.en_US: “When we designed Spryker, our goal was to create an architecture that works well for small Taskforce-like teams as well as big clients with large teams and ambitious backlogs.”
